title: Fablehaven: The Complete Series Boxed Set
description: Brandon Mull’s New York Times bestselling series about siblings Seth and Kendra, who discover their grandparents are the caretakers of a sanctuary for magical creatures!This hardcover boxed set includes:FablehavenRise of the Evening StarGrip of the Shadow PlagueSecrets of the Dragon SanctuaryKeys to the Demon Prison
author: Brandon Mull
